title: Excimer
author: Excimer
created_time: November 09, 2022, 10:31:32 AMLast edit: February 05, 2025, 12:54:53 PM by Excimer
content: LoyceV gives out secular as forum rules(LoyceV gives out secular sayings, that not included in forum rules, as forum rules)Quote from: LoyceV on February 05, 2025, 10:58:06 AMI don't want to post in the troll's self-moderated topics, but I wonder if he's seen this post:Quote from: theymos on January 13, 2020, 04:46:57 AMWhy are you guys posting the old names of people who clearly needed their names changed for privacy reasons? Obviously any data posted online is going to be quickly archived somewhere, but that doesn't mean that your highlighting/reposting of it has no effect. In some cases you may literally be putting lives in danger. If you were investigating a scam or something, that'd be different, but you seem to just be indiscriminately & recklessly dredging up data that would best be forgotten.I. Admin's sayings are admin's sayings. With which you can agree or not agree. Disagreeing with common sayings at usual discussions between DT-cians is not violation. II. Forum rules are forum rules. Which everyone is required to follow. Violation of rules is a crime on the forum.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: February 05, 2025, 12:13:20 PMLast edit: February 05, 2025, 12:51:22 PM by Excimer
comments.body: I don't want to communicate with this situationist, opportunistand manipulator passing off one thing as another.So tell him that I only obey the rules of the forum, and not the secular sayings between DT-cians.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on November 09, 2022, 10:31:32 AMQuote from: LoyceV on February 05, 2025, 10:58:06 AMI don't want to post in the troll's self-moderated topics, but I wonder if he's seen this post:Loyce didn't say anything about a rule - only asked a question if someone saw a post.

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on February 06, 2025, 12:04:20 AMLoyce didn't say anything about a rule - only asked a question if someone saw a post.So now that secular saying that quoted by LoyceV not a rule?  Now it's clear, because I thought that secualar sayings between DT-cians was a rule, but then I read the forum rules and didn't find any what LoyceV mean  I don't understand why I'm feeding this troll? I won't fall for his trolling anymore.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: Excimer on February 06, 2025, 04:41:25 PMQuote from: Vod on February 06, 2025, 12:04:20 AMLoyce didn't say anything about a rule - only asked a question if someone saw a post.So now that secular saying that quoted by LoyceV not a rule?  As long as you are happy, that's all that matters I guess.
